resources.string:
The appetizer collects location data when the app is closed or unused to provide information on the interior store and notification of benefits based on your current location.

This data is also used to support advertising.
\Do you want to allow access to the location of this device even when you are not using the appetizer app?
Interior store information and benefits notification.
Searching for indoor stores and benefits.
Press to set > Place Notification Pop-up OFF
